sentences.en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
sentences.cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

sentences.en: All Dreamland's electric blankets are guaranteed for three years.
sentences.cn: 所有的梦乡牌电热毯质保3年。

sentences.en: Give the cardboard two or three coats of varnish to harden it.
sentences.cn: 在纸板上涂两三层清漆使其变硬。

sentences.en: He will actually be serving three concurrent five-year sentences.
sentences.cn: 实际上，他将服3个5年徒刑，合并执行。

sentences.en: In 1986 more than three million were receiving unemployment benefit.
sentences.cn: 1986年，有300多万人领取失业救济金。

sentences.en: Interest is paid monthly. Three months' notice is required for withdrawals.
sentences.cn: 利息按月支付。提款须提前3个月通知银行。

sentences.en: Its own estimate of three hundred tallies with that of another survey.
sentences.cn: 其估计数目300与另一项调查的结果相吻合。

sentences.en: My little sister’s only three (= three years old ) .
The area has been the scene of fierce fighting for three months.
sentences.cn: 这一地区3个月以来不断发生激战。

sentences.en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
sentences.cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

sentences.en: There were three moderate climbs to just below the 450 feet contour.
sentences.cn: 刚好在450英尺的等高线之下有3个缓坡。

sentences.en: They clocked off duty and left at ten to three.
sentences.cn: 他们打卡下班，于2点50分离开。

sentences.en: They were spotted after three hours adrift in a dinghy.
sentences.cn: 他们在小舢板上漂浮了3个小时后才被发现。

sentences.en: They’ve won their last three games.
sentences.cn: 他们赢了最近三场比赛。

sentences.en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
Three mortar shells had landed close to a crowd of people.
Unemployment is now a whisker away from three million.
sentences.cn: 现在的失业人数已接近300万。

sentences.en: We’d better go. It’s almost three (= three o’clock ) .

words.tran_cn: 三人一组；三人的竞赛；一人对两人的比赛

phrases.tran_cn: 三巨头；美国三大汽车公司
n. 三河城（加拿大魁北克省南部城市）
每周三次，一个礼拜三次

trans.tran_cn: 三岁，三个人[东西]，三，三个
